snippet.title: Mexican High School Simulator 2018 Trailer
snippet.description:
Mexican School Simulator  is an anime style school simulator based on the schools of Mexico, the artistic design of the school is based on a real institution, it combines  Sandbox ,  adventure ,  platformer   mystery ,  terror  and  RPG  gameplay. At the beginning of the game you will have your own house, your car and the opportunity to study in this prestigious school.
Enter the life of a Mexican student, walk the halls of this school interact with the various students, drive a car, perform various academic activities and have fun.
Explore each classroom of the school, get ready to go back to class also explore a small part of the city of Tepic Nayarit, take a walk around here, and enjoy the graphics that have been optimized for smartphones.
And don't forget to investigate the mysteries of this school.
Features
- Large map based on a real school to explore.
- Various Characters.
- Character customization.
- Various hair, clothes and hats.
- Several missions to perform. 
- Several places to explore.
- Driving vehicles.
- Interaction with other characters.
- Anime style graphics.
- Pets to interact with.
- Mysteries to solve.
- Tacos  included.

If you like the game download here:⇣⇣⇣⇣⇣⇣⇣⇣
https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=6893988486004345914
